variable.name: Y1
variable.description: Total AT8 Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total AT8 NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M20 + N20 + O20 + P20 + P2_20 + P2_24 + R2 + S4 + T3.

variable.name: Y2
variable.description: Cortical AT8 Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical AT8 NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M20 + N20 + O20 + P20 + P2_20 + P2_24.

variable.name: Y3
variable.description: MTL AT8 Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total MTL AT8 NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: R2 + S4 + T3.

variable.name: Y4
variable.description: Total Biel Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total Biel NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M19 + N19 + O19 + P19 + P2_19 + P2_23 + R3 + S5 + T4.

variable.name: Y5
variable.description: Cortical Biel Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical Biel NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M19 + N19 + O19 + P19 + P2_19 + P2_23.

variable.name: Y6
variable.description: MTL Biel Neurofibrillary Tangles (summary count)
variable.comment: Total MTL Biel NFTs, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: R3 + S5 + T4.

variable.name: Y7
variable.description: Total Diffuse Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total diffuse plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M22 + N22 + O22 + P22 + P2_22 + P2_26 + R8 + S8 + T7.

variable.name: Y8
variable.description: Cortical Diffuse Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical diffuse plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M22 + N22 + O22 + P22 + P_22 + P2_26.

variable.name: Y9
variable.description: MTL Diffuse Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total MTL diffuse plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: R8 + S8 + T7.

variable.name: Y10
variable.description: Total Neuritic Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total neuritic plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M21 + N21 + O21 + P21 + P2_21 + P2_25 + R7 + S7 + T6.

variable.name: Y11
variable.description: Cortical Neuritic Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical neuritic plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M21 + N21 + O21 + P21 + P2_21 + P2_25.

variable.name: Y12
variable.description: MTL Neuritic Plaques (summary count)
variable.comment: Total MTL neuritic plaques, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: R7 + S7 + T6.

variable.name: Y13
variable.description: Total Cavitated Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cavitated microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables:K9 + K10 + L2 + L6 + M3 + M7 + N3 + N7 + O3 + O7 + P3 + P7 + P2_3 + P2_7 + R21 + S12 + T12 + U12 + V9 + V19 + W8 + W15 + X4 + X15.

variable.name: Y14
variable.description: Total Non-cavitated Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total non-cavitated microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L3 + L7 + M4 + M8 + N4 + N8 + O4 + O8 + P4 + P8 + P2_4 + P2_8 + R22 + S13 + T13 + U13 + V10 + V20 + X5 + X16.

variable.name: Y15
variable.description: Total Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: Y13 + Y14.

variable.name: Y16
variable.description: Total Acute Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total acute microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L4 + L8 + M5 + M9 + N5 + N9 + O5 + O9 + P5 + P9 + P2_5 + P2_9 + R23 + S14 + T14 + U14 + V11 + V21 + X6 + X17.

variable.name: Y17
variable.description: Total Microhemorrhages (summary count)
variable.comment: Total micorhemorrhages, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L5 + L9 + M6 + M10 + N6 + N10 + O6 + O10 + P6 + P10 + P2_6 + P2_10 + R24 + S15 + T15 + U15 + V12 + V22 + X7 + X18.

variable.name: Y18
variable.description: Total Cortical Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L2 + L3 + M3 + M4 + N3 + N4 + O3 + O4 + P3 + P4 + P2_3 + P2_4 + R21 + R22 + S12 + S13 + T12 + T13.

variable.name: Y19
variable.description: Total Subcortical Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total subcortical microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L6 + L7 + M7 + M8 + N7 + N8 + O7 + O8 + P7 + P8 + P2_7 + P2_8.

variable.name: Y20
variable.description: Total Cortical Acute Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical acute microinfarcts, taking the greatest of left and right from the following variables: L4 + M5 + N5 + O5 + P5 + P2_5.

variable.name: Y21
variable.description: Total Subcortical Acute Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total subcortical acute microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: L8 + M9 + N9 + O9 + P9 + P2_9.

variable.name: Y22
variable.description: Deep Nuclei Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total deep nuclei microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: U12 + U13 + V9 + V10 + V19 + V20.

variable.name: Y23
variable.description: MTL Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total MTL microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: R21 + R22 + S12 + S13 + T12 + T13.

variable.name: Y24
variable.description: Brainstem Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total brainstem microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: K9 + K10 + W8 + W15.

variable.name: Y25
variable.description: Cerebellar Microinfarcts (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cerebellar microinfarcts, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: X4 + X5 + X15 + X16.

variable.name: Y26
variable.description: Total Cortical Lewy Body (summary count)
variable.comment: Total cortical Lewy body, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: M23 + M24 + N23 + O23 + R17 + S9 + S17 + T8.

variable.name: Y27
variable.description: Brainstem Lewy Body (summary count)
variable.comment: Total brainstem Lewy body, taking the greatest number of left and right from the following variables: K4 + W7 + W11 + W16 + U3.

variable.name: NPGROSS
variable.description: Does the brain have any gross or microscopic pathology (including any Alzheimer type pathology such as senile plaques and neurofibrillary tangles)?

variable.name: NPNIT
variable.description: For any brain showing any degree of Alzheimer type pathology: NIA/Reagan Institute neuropathological criteria used.
variable.value: High likelihood of dementia being due to Alzheimer's disease
Intermediate likelihood of dementia being due to Alzheimer's disease
Low likelihood of dementia being due to Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: NPCERAD
variable.description: For any brain showing any degree of Alzheimer type pathology: CERAD neuropathological criteria used.

variable.name: NPOCRIT
variable.description: For any brain showing any degree of Alzheimer type pathology: Other or unspecified neuropathological criteria used (e.g., Tierney, etc.).

variable.name: NPNEUR
variable.description: For most severely affected cortical region: Neuritic plaques (plaques with argyrophilic dystrophic neuritis with or without dense amyloid cores).

variable.name: NPDIFF
variable.description: For most severely affected cortical region: diffuse plagues (plagues with non-compact amyloid and no apparent dystrophic neurites).

variable.name: NPVASC
variable.description: Is ischemic, hemorrhagic or vascular pathology present?

variable.name: NPLEWY
variable.description: For all brains where Lewy Bodies are detected: pathology is consistent with criteria of Consortium on Dementia with Lewy Bodies.
variable.value: Lewy body pathology, brainstem predominant type
Lewy body pathology, intermediate or transitional (limbic) type
Lewy body pathology, unspecified or not further assessed

variable.name: NPLEWYCS
variable.description: For all brains where Lewy Bodies are detected: likelihood that DLB Clinical Syndrome due to DLB Pathology.
variable.value: Lewy body pathology, unspecified or not further assessed

variable.name: NPPNORM
variable.description: What primary pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Normal brain.

variable.name: NPCNORM
variable.description: What contributing pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Normal brain.

variable.name: NPPADP
variable.description: What primary pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Alzheimer disease pathology present but insufficient for AD diagnosis.

variable.name: NPCADP
variable.description: What contributing pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Alzheimer's disease pathology present but insufficient for AD diagnosis.

variable.name: NPPAD
variable.description: What primary pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: NPCAD
variable.description: What contributing pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Alzheimer's Disease.

variable.name: NPPVASC
variable.description: What primary pathologic diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Vascular disease.

variable.name: NPCVASC
variable.description: What contributing pathological diagnoses or features which you judge to be responsible for the subject's cognitive status: Vascular disease.

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: FHS Participant SHARe ID Number
